channel.title: They're gonna taste great!
channel.description:
http://video.google.co.uk/videoplay?docid=-4270458065644031389&q=frosties
This is a new craze in highschools all around England.
Some people have even made rumors that the kid who sang in it:
Killed Himself. Got stabbed by a group of kids. He has formed a rap band.
All of these have been believed.
Ironically, I'm eating Frosties with no milk at the moment xD. THEY TASTE GREAT.
EDIT: http://video.google.co.uk/videoplay?docid=-3773843686530819407&q=frosties
THAT MADE ME LAUGH SO HARD.

item.title: They're gonna taste great!
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

lol, actually this is the crazy in Britian at the moment, let me explain why:

Frosties is a well know cereal and eaten alot in britain, with the brand picture of ‘Tony the Tiger’ and his catch phrase ‘They’re gonna taste Great’.
The boy singing the sond there is actually 17 years old and EVERYONE is taking the piss outa him atm because hes singing this song. Its hilarious just watching people running up and down the streets shouting ‘They’re gonna taste great’
So mnay rumours have been surrounding him such as:

He’s been stabbed
He had to move to South Africa to escape the Bullying
He has cancer and its his last dying wish to be on TV.

I love this add, is so fucking funny.

Read full topic
